articles.description: India's policymakers see a 'Goldilocks scenario' with a 4.5% inflation and 7% growth forecast for FY25, suggesting a balanced economy. The Reserve Bank of India's Monetary Policy Committee agrees on the need for caution amid uncertainties. While optimistic ab…
articles.content: With an inflation and growth forecast of 4.5 per cent and 7 per cent each for FY25, India's policymakers are inferring that the economy is in a 'Goldilocks scenario'. However, economists say they mus… [+3816 chars]

articles.title: Kawasaki Ninja 500 vs Aprilia RS457 comparison - The Financial Express
articles.description: The new Kawasaki Ninja 500 competes against the Aprilia RS457 in India and here's how they compare against each other.
articles.content: The newest fully-faired 500cc motorcycle in the Indian market is the Kawasaki Ninja 500, launched at Rs 5.24 lakh ex-showroom. The Ninja sits in a rapidly growing segment consisting of the KTM RC390,… [+2303 chars]

articles.author: Ravindra Sonavane
articles.title: MC Graphixstory | FIIs cut stake in frontline FMCG stocks on weak sales growth in Q3 - Moneycontrol
articles.description: In Q3, FIIs reduced their stake in Hindustan Unilever to 13.65 percent from the previous quarter's 13.90 percent. Their stake in ITC dropped to 43.26 percent from 43.34 percent, as per the latest shareholding pattern data from exchanges
articles.content:
Foreign investors reduced their exposure to frontline fast moving consumer goods (FMCG) companies in the December quarter as volume sales growth stayed weak.
